virtual void ibase::IMessageContainer::SetMaxLiveTime ( int  maxLiveTime = -1) [pure virtual]

Set maximum time difference between the oldest and newest message.

If calculated value is grated then this threshold, the oldest message will be removed if a new message will be added.

Parameters:
maxLiveTimemaximal time difference in seconds
virtual void ibase::IMessageContainer::SetMaxMessageCount ( int  maxMessageCount = -1) [pure virtual]

Set maximal number of messages in the container.

If a new message will be added to the full container, the oldest message will be removed.

Parameters:
maxMessageCountmaximal number of messages in the container. If the value equals -1, no limit is set for.
